name: postmark-cli
description: Postmarkapp.com CLI to use CI/CD in email templates

scripts.cover: yarn run pretest && istanbul cover _mocha --include-all-sources true --report lcovonly -- --recursive build/test/
scripts.cover-xml: yarn run pretest && istanbul cover _mocha --include-all-sources true --report lcovonly -- --recursive --reporter mocha-junit-reporter build/test/
